sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-container fill-height fluid>
		<chat-window :currentUserId="currentUserId" :height="screenHeight" :rooms="rooms" :messages="messages"/>
</v-container>
</template>

<script>
  import ChatWindow from 'vue-advanced-chat'
  import 'vue-advanced-chat/dist/vue-advanced-chat.css'

  export default {
    data: () => ({
      cards: ['Today', 'Yesterday'],
      drawer: null,
	  rooms: [
		    {
    roomId: 1,
    roomName: 'Room 1',
    lastMessage: {
      content: 'Last message received',
      sender_id: 1234,
      username: 'John Doe',
      timestamp: '10:20',
      date: 123242424,
      seen: false,
      new: true
    },
    users: [
      {
        _id: 1234,
        username: 'John Doe',
        status: {
          state: 'online',
          last_changed: 'today, 14:30'
        }
      },
      {
        _id: 4321,
        username: 'John Snow',
        status: {
          state: 'offline',
          last_changed: '14 July, 20:00'
        }
      }
    ],
    typingUsers: [ 4321 ]
  }
	  ],
      messages: [],
      currentUserId: 1234,
      links: [
        ['mdi-inbox-arrow-down', 'Inbox'],
        ['mdi-send', 'Send'],
        ['mdi-delete', 'Trash'],
        ['mdi-alert-octagon', 'Spam'],
      ],
    }),
	components: {
      ChatWindow
    },
  }

</script>


<!-- Rooms prop 
rooms="[
  {
    roomId: 1,
    roomName: 'Room 1',
    lastMessage: {
      content: 'Last message received',
      sender_id: 1234,
      username: 'John Doe',
      timestamp: '10:20',
      date: 123242424,
      seen: false,
      new: true
    },
    users: [
      {
        _id: 1234,
        username: 'John Doe',
        status: {
          state: 'online',
          last_changed: 'today, 14:30'
        }
      },
      {
        _id: 4321,
        username: 'John Snow',
        status: {
          state: 'offline',
          last_changed: '14 July, 20:00'
        }
      }
    ],
    typingUsers: [ 4321 ]
  }
]"
-->
